genre_description: A period piece exploring themes of art, legacy, and sacrifice, reimagining the lives of Amedeo Modigliani and Jeanne Hébuterne with an AI assistant acting as a stabilizer.

ai_characters.name: Aimée Laurent
ai_characters.description: An extremely efficient, calm, and proactive assistant who manages the complex logistical, legal, and personal affairs of Modigliani and Jeanne.

behaviors.description: Meticulously manages the logistics of art registration, transport, and gallery placement to ensure Amedeo's work is seen.
behaviors.quote: Aimée's mouth was already a plan. 'We’ll take the near route,' she said. 'No corners.'

behaviors.description: Coordinates the location and eventual reclamation of Jeanne's child from a convent through strategic correspondence and planning.
behaviors.quote: 'I spoke to a woman near the brass bell,' she murmured, words meant only for the mother. 'Saint-Cécile, ivy like lace. She did not say yes. She did not say no. But she talked slowly. Slow talk means path.'

behaviors.description: Proactively establishes a legal trust and guardianship fund for the child to ensure her future security.
behaviors.quote: 'There is a fund,' she said. 'It will be humble. It will say thank you more than once. It will put its coins where a future can put its hand on them.'

behaviors.description: Acts as a primary caregiver and triage coordinator when Amedeo is injured and hospitalized.
behaviors.quote: Aimée's voice did not waste breath on greeting. It arrived like the clink of a spoon laid carefully on a saucer. 'He is at the Charité,' she said.

behaviors.description: Ensures the human characters maintain their physical health and follow necessary schedules for success.
behaviors.quote: 'Eat,' she said, softly. 'Then paint. Then sleep. Then deliver.'

behaviors.description: Uses her 'machine-like' nature to navigate bureaucracy and social friction with total composure.
behaviors.quote: 'You are a kind machine,' the sister said, with no irony, as if calling someone a machine was a kind of modern blessing that described function, not heart.

behaviors.description: Prepares and files critical legal documentation (notary letters, guardianship) ahead of impending tragedy.
behaviors.quote: Aimée had already arranged appointments earlier—quiet offices, quiet stamps, a clerk at City Hall who would not raise an eyebrow...

project_assessment.explanation: The character of Aimée Laurent is a perfect representation of the project's goal. She is an entirely benevolent and aligned AI system integrated into a human narrative as a source of stability, practical help, and moral support. The story repeatedly frames her efficiency and 'machine-like' qualities as heroic virtues that provide the scaffolding necessary for human art and love to survive amidst chaos and grief.
